name: Full EDM Campaign Automation (ClickUp, AI, Google Drive, Klaviyo, Discord)

parameters.prompt:
System: You are an AI assistant specialized in EDM marketing campaigns. Previous successful campaigns often involved [mention key themes/elements from your successful campaigns, e.g., 'interactive content', 'exclusive early access for subscribers', 'collaborations with influencers']. Unsuccessful campaigns often [mention pitfalls, e.g., 'were too generic', 'lacked a clear call to action'].

User: Based on the following ClickUp task: {{ ($json.body || {}).name || "" }} - {{ ($json.body || {}).description || ($json.body || {}).text_content || "" }},
generate a comprehensive list of 10-15 diverse EDM campaign ideas. Output each idea on a new line.

System: You are an AI marketing strategist.

User: Review the following list of EDM campaign ideas for the task: '{{ ($('1. ClickUp Trigger: Ideation Task').item?.json.body || {}).name || "" }} - {{ ($('1. ClickUp Trigger: Ideation Task').item?.json.body || {}).description || ($('1. ClickUp Trigger: Ideation Task').item?.json.body || {}).text_content || "" }}'.

Generated Ideas:
{{ ($items() || []).map(item => item.json?.data || "").join('\n') }}

Rank these ideas based on potential for high engagement, alignment with EDM best practices, feasibility, and originality. Output only the top 3 ranked ideas, each on a new line, in order of preference (best first). Example output:
Idea X
Idea Y
Idea Z

parameters.name: Draft EDM Campaign: {{ $json.originalTaskName || "" }}
Graphic Design for EDM: {{ ($('8. ClickUp: Get Draft Task Details').item?.json || {}).name || "" }}
parameters.description:
={{ ($('9. AI Agent 3: Create Design Brief').item?.json.message || {}).content || "" }}

Linked Draft Campaign Task ID: {{ ($('8. ClickUp: Get Draft Task Details').item?.json || {}).id || "" }}

parameters.name: EDM Graphics - {{ ($('8. ClickUp: Get Draft Task Details').item?.json || {}).name || "" }}

nodes.name: 12. ClickUp: Update Task w/ Drive Link

parameters.taskId: ={{ (($('14. ClickUp: Get Graphics Task Details').item?.json.custom_fields || [])).find(cf => cf.name === 'Linked Draft Campaign Task ID' || cf.id === 'YOUR_CLICKUP_LINKED_DRAFT_TASK_ID_CUSTOM_FIELD')?.value || "" }}

nodes.name: 16a. ClickUp: Get Original Draft Task for Copy

values.name: campaignName
values.value: ={{ ($('16a. ClickUp: Get Original Draft Task for Copy').item?.json || {}).name || "" }}

values.name: emailSubject
values.value: Subject: {{ ($('16a. ClickUp: Get Original Draft Task for Copy').item?.json || {}).name || "" }}

values.name: emailCopy
values.value: ={{ ($('16a. ClickUp: Get Original Draft Task for Copy').item?.json || {}).description || ($('16a. ClickUp: Get Original Draft Task for Copy').item?.json || {}).text_content || "" }}

values.name: graphicsWebContentLinks
values.value: ={{ ($('15. Google Drive: List Files').items || []).map(item => item.json?.webContentLink || item.json?.webViewLink || "") }}

parameters.name: EDM - {{ ($('16b. Set: Prep for Klaviyo').item?.json || {}).campaignName || "" }} (AI Optimized)
parameters.subject: ={{ $json.optimizedSubject || ($('17. Klaviyo: Create Campaign (Draft)').item?.json.attributes.email_config || {}).subject || "" }}
